character.name: Dracula
character.description:
<c=E81B16>DRACULA</c>
Just running a pile of miserable errands.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: At the end of turn, <c=downside>take 1 damage</c> and decrease this by 1.

BloodMirror.name: Blood Mirror
BloodMirror.description: Whenever you take hull damage, your enemy also takes as much. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn.</c>
